alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 7:47PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, northern Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 746 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles southwest of Perry to 26 miles northwest of Steinhatchee to 30 miles southeast of St. Marks. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Cross City, Steinhatchee, Tennille, Shamrock, Jug Island, Clara, Cross City Airport, Dekle Beach, Jonesboro, Jack Lee Island, Grady, Hatch Bend, Salem, San Pedro Junction, Cedar Island, Fish Creek, Cooks Hammock, Howell Place and Guaranto Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
